products.title: Kenyan Pride Bracelet
products.subtitle: Handcrafted beaded bracelet in Kenyan flag colors
products.description: This stunning handcrafted bracelet embodies the spirit of Kenya through its vibrant beadwork in the colors of the national flag. Each bead is carefully selected and woven by skilled Maasai artisans using traditional techniques passed down through generations.

products.title: Maasai Heritage Necklace
products.subtitle: Traditional beadwork necklace with cultural patterns
products.description: A stunning necklace featuring intricate Maasai beadwork patterns representing heritage and tradition. Handcrafted with precision and care.

products.title: Unity Anklet
products.subtitle: Elegant anklet symbolizing peace and prosperity
products.description: Delicate anklet featuring white and green beads representing peace and prosperity. Perfect for everyday wear.

products.title: Warrior Spirit Bracelet
products.subtitle: Bold design inspired by Maasai warrior traditions
products.description: A powerful bracelet featuring black and red beads, inspired by the strength and courage of Maasai warriors.

products.title: Heritage Choker
products.subtitle: Stunning choker necklace with intricate beadwork
products.description: An elegant choker featuring traditional Maasai patterns in vibrant red beads. A statement piece for any occasion.

products.title: Prosperity Bracelet Set
products.subtitle: Set of three bracelets in Kenyan flag colors
products.description: A beautiful set of three coordinating bracelets featuring all the colors of the Kenyan flag. Perfect for stacking or gifting.

products.title: Maasai Beadwork T-Shirt - Black
products.subtitle: Premium cotton t-shirt with traditional bead pattern print
products.description: Celebrate Maasai culture with this premium 100% cotton t-shirt featuring an authentic beadwork pattern design. The print showcases traditional Maasai colors and patterns, making it a perfect blend of heritage and modern fashion. Soft, comfortable, and ethically made.

products.title: Kenyan Flag T-Shirt
products.subtitle: Bold flag design on premium cotton
products.description: Show your Kenyan pride with this vibrant t-shirt featuring the colors of the national flag in a modern beaded pattern design. Made from 100% organic cotton, this shirt is both comfortable and sustainable. Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

products.title: Heritage Beadwork T-Shirt - White
products.subtitle: Classic white tee with colorful bead pattern
products.description: A timeless white t-shirt adorned with a vibrant Maasai beadwork pattern across the chest. The design features authentic traditional colors and symbols. Made from premium ringspun cotton for superior comfort and durability. Unisex fit.

products.title: Warrior Spirit T-Shirt - Green
products.subtitle: Bold green tee with warrior-inspired design
products.description: Channel the strength of Maasai warriors with this striking green t-shirt. Features a bold beadwork-inspired graphic that represents courage and tradition. Made from eco-friendly cotton blend. Perfect for those who want to make a statement.

products.title: Sunset Beaded Bracelet
products.subtitle: Warm orange and red beaded bracelet
products.description: Inspired by the beautiful Kenyan sunsets, this bracelet features warm orange, red, and gold beads arranged in traditional patterns. Each piece is unique and handmade by Maasai women artisans. Adjustable clasp for perfect fit.

products.title: Savanna Statement Necklace
products.subtitle: Multi-strand beaded necklace in earth tones
products.description: A stunning multi-strand necklace featuring earth-toned beads that capture the essence of the African savanna. This statement piece combines traditional Maasai beadwork with contemporary style. Perfect for special occasions or to elevate any outfit.

products.title: Tribal Elegance Earrings
products.subtitle: Handcrafted beaded drop earrings
products.description: Elegant drop earrings featuring intricate Maasai beadwork in traditional patterns. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. Each pair is handcrafted and slightly unique. Hypoallergenic hooks suitable for sensitive ears.

products.title: Cultural Pride Ankle Bracelet
products.subtitle: Delicate beaded anklet with traditional charm
products.description: A delicate anklet featuring small glass beads in Kenyan flag colors with a traditional Maasai shield charm. Perfect for beach days or adding a touch of culture to any outfit. Adjustable length with secure clasp.

products.title: Artisan Collection Gift Set
products.subtitle: Curated set of bracelet, necklace, and earrings
products.description: A beautifully packaged gift set featuring a coordinating bracelet, necklace, and pair of earrings. All pieces are handcrafted by the same artisan for perfect harmony. Comes in an elegant gift box with information about the artisan and Maasai beadwork traditions. Perfect for gifting or treating yourself.
